channel.title: Error
channel.description: Hi im trying to setup dodian mysql server and i get this error Uber Server 3.0 - Created by Winten - Dodian ------------------------------------------------------- Error loading settings java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "WorldId=3" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unk nown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.main(server.java:89) No suitable driver found for localhost No suitable driver found for localhost Loading npcs... java.lang.NullPointerException at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1324) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:67) at server.main(server.java:108) drops... null java.lang.NullPointerException at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1338) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:69) at server.main(server.java:108) spawn list...java.lang.NullPointerException at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1251) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:71) at server.main(server.java:108) done! null java.lang.NullPointerException at DoorHandler.mysql_connect(DoorHandler.java:36) at DoorHandler.<init>(DoorHandler.java:15) at server.main(server.java:110) java.lang.NullPointerException at DoorHandler.<init>(DoorHandler.java:16) at server.main(server.java:110) java.lang.NullPointerException at server.loadObjects(server.java:310) at server.main(server.java:116) please help and thanks

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“orpal, post:1, topic:388899”]Hi im trying to setup dodian mysql server and i get this error
Uber Server 3.0 - Created by Winten - Dodian

Error loading settings
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “WorldId=3”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unk nown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at server.main(server.java:89)
No suitable driver found for localhost
No suitable driver found for localhost
Loading npcs… java.lang.NullPointerException
at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1324)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:67)
at server.main(server.java:108)
drops… null
java.lang.NullPointerException
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1338)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:69)
at server.main(server.java:108)
spawn list…java.lang.NullPointerException
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1251)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:71)
at server.main(server.java:108)
done!
null
java.lang.NullPointerException
at DoorHandler.mysql_connect(DoorHandler.java:36)
at DoorHandler.(DoorHandler.java:15)
at server.main(server.java:110)
java.lang.NullPointerException
at DoorHandler.(DoorHandler.java:16)
at server.main(server.java:110)
java.lang.NullPointerException
at server.loadObjects(server.java:310)
at server.main(server.java:116)
please help and thanks[/quote]

orpal:

java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “WorldId=3”

Your number format is wrong make sure its the correct format aka an integer or if its 0. I think double (forgotten that lol).
I would create an integer ‘WorldId’ and set it equal to 3 like that rather that how your trying too.

[quote=“orpal, post:1, topic:388899”]Loading npcs… java.lang.NullPointerException
at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1324)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:67)
at server.main(server.java:108)
drops… null[/quote]

You don’t have an NPC droplist or its loaded incorrectly.

[quote=“orpal, post:1, topic:388899”]java.lang.NullPointerException
at DoorHandler.mysql_connect(DoorHandler.java:36)
at DoorHandler.(DoorHandler.java:15)
at server.main(server.java:110)[/quote]

^

Read full topic
